In crate modint_mersenne

?

Trait modint_mersenne::FromPrimitiveInt

pub trait FromPrimitiveInt<T>
where
    T: Number,
{
    type Output;

    // Required method
    fn new(x: T) -> Self::Output;
}
Expand description

Trait for converting primitive integers to ModInt. impl this for each primitive integer type to use new method.

Required Associated Types§

type Output

Required Methods§

fn new(x: T) -> Self::Output

Object Safety§

This trait is not object safe.
